subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Chase Litton went 23 of 34 for 218 yards and one touchdown as Marshall won its 10th game this season by beating Connecticut, 16-10, in the St. Petersburg Bowl on Saturday in Florida.
snippet: Chase Litton went 23 of 34 for 218 yards and one touchdown as Marshall won its 10th game this season by beating Connecticut, 16-10, in the St. Petersburg Bowl on Saturday in Florida.
